titleStmt.title: A summe of morall philosophy succinctly gathered, elegantly composed, and methodically handled, by that learned scholler and worthy diuine William Pemble Mr of Arts and late commoner of Mag. Hall
titleStmt.author: Pemble, William, 1592?-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield printer to the famous Vniversity, for Edward Forrest,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
